title: Patio Pantry
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Catering
description: Vegetarian cafeteria attached to the Loma Linda market, both owned by Loma Linda University. Mostly lacto-ovo vegetarian with some vegan items. Made-to-order sandwiches, salad bar, soups, potatoes, and main entrees, fast food, and fresh juice. Very casual, busy at lunch time. Previously located on Anderson St.
